title: Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and core competencies relevant to job roles
context.additional_context: Social analysis competency enhancement for workplace application via game-based learning, tailored for professionals adapted to BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can design conflict management strategies within organizations with over 80% accuracy through game-based simulations.
Learners can present three or more case studies applying a social issue analysis framework through gamification activities.
Learners can record and provide feedback on negotiation simulation results among stakeholders with over 75% participation through role-playing games.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
